      • getEntitiesWithComponent

        public java.util.Collection<Entity> getEntitiesWithComponent​(java.lang.Class<? extends Component> compClass)
        Gets all the entities having a given Component.
        Parameters:
        compClass - The Component class.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Entity.

      • getEntitiesWithComponents

        public java.util.Collection<Entity> getEntitiesWithComponents​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends Component>> compClasses)
        Gets all the entities having all the given Component.
        Parameters:
        compClasses - A Collection of Component class.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Entity.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity​(Entity e)

        Adds an Entity to the Engine.

        The Entity is automatically added to the relevant systems.

        Parameters:
        e - An Entity.

      • removeEntity

        public Entity removeEntity​(int id)

        Removes an Entity from the Engine.

        The Entity is automatically removed from the relevant systems.

        Parameters:
        id - The ID of an Entity in the Engine.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity​(int id)
        Gets an Entity of the Engine provided its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the Entity.
        Returns:
        An Entity.

      • hasSystem

        public boolean hasSystem​(java.lang.Class<? extends System> sysClass)
        Checks if a System is in the Engine.
        Parameters:
        sysClass - A System class.
        Returns:
        True if the System is in the Engine.

      • addSystem

        public void addSystem​(System sys)

        Adds a System to the Engine.

        Relevant entities are automatically added to the System.

        Parameters:
        sys - A System.

      • removeSystem

        public void removeSystem​(java.lang.Class<? extends System> sysClass)

        Removes a System from the Engine.

        Relevant entities are automatically removed from the System.

        Parameters:
        sysClass - The System Class.

      • update

        public void update​(int dt)
        Processes all Systems
        Parameters:
        dt - Delta-time, the amount of time elapsed since last update.
